input.sentences: today was the day of the beast cancer walk .
i was so excited to be walking | considering all i have been through .
this is a picture of my friends and i before the walk .
my brother was there supporting his girlfriend .
she had her pom poms like a true cheerleader and champion .
output.sentences: It's tradition for our town to sponsor a walk for cancer on the second official day of spring.
I am walking for the first time this year and I am so excited.
My friends and I are going to start the walk together and we have taken a 'pink day' picture to commorate the great moment.
The girl power in the air is so great and everyone is so supporting of one another, because we all know someone, a friend, sister, brother, loved one, impacted by cancer.
My best friend Sally isn't going to walk this year, but she brought her pom-pons to cheer us on!
